reviewTitle: An amazing day out well worthwhile
review_details: A great fantastic day fishing, lovely people, fabulous food, great no matter what age this family run business are kind friendly and have a great sense of humour, nothing is to much trouble, it is also very educational.Have already booked for a second trip. A big thank you to all who made our day very memorable.

Family run by two brothers and there mam, and two lovely lady waitress, always friendly, and a warm welcome good clean food, English speaking , nothing to much, open Friday night Saturday night and all day Sunday through the winter. And they all have a good sense of humour love them

reviewTitle: My favourite place summer autumn winter or spring
review_details: Marina's market and Aeolos bar has been a regular place for us in Spartia over the last 8 years. Marina and her family have helped us to integrate into the village in many ways - customs, language and local advice. Even in winter when most of the island closes down the market shop remains open and we are still welcomed into their snug for a chat, an update and a drink. Well worth a visit.
